short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents Tumblr from stretching lower width images to 500px.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When Tumblr users upload images less than 540px in width, Tumblr stretches them to 540px, often resulting in ugly, soft images. Maxwidth reverses the stretching, returning images to their sharp state and intended resolution.
